Title: bitHammingDistance
Description: Returns the Hamming Distance between the bit representations of two integer values. Can be used with SimHash functions for detection of semi-duplicate strings. The smaller is the distance, the more likely those strings are the same.
int1 — First integer value. Int64.int2 — Second integer value. Int64.
Examples: SELECT bitHammingDistance(ngramSimHash('cat ate rat'), ngramSimHash('rat ate cat'));
